participant_1.name: Clara
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, with a passion for history and nature.
participant_1.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: warm-hearted and resourceful, always sharing stories from his life.
participant_2.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i am retired and living the great life. i do not have a smartphone.
